She sells clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics and other products through the popular direct selling brands like Avon, Fuller life, Natasha, Boardwalk, Marikina Shoe Exchange, and other direct selling brands. A customer's order is purchased in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer with a one-month-to-pay credit. Dealer’s prices are lower than those in the catalog, and these are the profits that dealers are investing on as their income. Evelyn's regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of 3,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every week.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting an 8,000 PHP loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy merchandise items and orders for her customers. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Evelyn hopes to grow her business in the coming years and dreams of being able to give her children a good and high quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for merchandise items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Allen

texts.en:
Allen used her previous loan to buy clothes for resale. Her major hardships are price fluctuations and inflation: nevertheless, she has a vision of expanding her business to new markets. She also has a personal goal of ensuring her children's eventual university educations.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy clothes to offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy clothes to offer for sale

loans.name: Bosco

texts.en:
Bosco used the previous loan to buy rice and sugar to offer for sale. He is facing hardships in price fluctuations and in having inadequate capital for purchasing enough stock to meet the high demand. He has a vision of expanding his business to new markets, and his personal goal is to educate his children.

He is requesting a loan to buy rice and sugar to offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy rice and sugar to offer for sale

loans.name: Mahugnon 23 Group

texts.fr: MAHUGNON 23 est un groupe de cinq personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même village et appartiennent à un même groupe de tontine. La représentante du groupe, Akpoton (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 29 ans. Akpoton est mariée à un certain Sègbégnon. Le couple a cinq  enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Akpoton, Pour subvenir à ses besoins, vend depuis près de quatorze ans des produits divers (riz, spaghetti, etc.) et des produits de beauté de façon ambulante. Akpoton s’approvisionne au Bénin. Dans le but d’agrandir son activité et  pour être plus compétitive sur le marché, Akpoton désire augmenter le stock de ses produits ; ce qui lui permettra d’accroitre son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu. Pour cette raison, Akpoton sollicite un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MAHUGNON 23. Le premier crédit consenti a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
MAHUGNON 23 is a group of five people whose members live in the same village and belong to the same savings group. The group’s representative is Akpoton (with her hand raised in the photo). She is 29 years old and married to a man named Sègbégnon. The couple have five dependent children, some of them in school. 

For nearly 14 years, Akpoton has been selling various products (rice, spaghetti, etc.) and cosmetics door-to-door to earn a living. She buys her merchandise in Benin. 

To expand her business, and to become more competitive on the market, Akpoton wishes to increase her stock, which would allow her to bolster her sales and her income. This is why she is seeking a second loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of the group MAHUGNON 23. The previous loan was correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy bags or rice, spaghetti, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
Raquel, age 33, runs a shop that sells clothing such as t-shirts, blouses, and especially souvenir shirts. She has had this business for five years. She and her husband have three children.
 
Raquel has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. She has requested a loan in the amount of PhP 11,000 to buy stocks of clothing to offer for sale.

 In the future, Raquel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of clothing to offer for sale

loans.name: Frank

texts.en:
Frank, age 42, lives with his wife and three children in Kasese. He has been dealing in firewood for two years now and his major challenge is the high cost of fuel and transportation costs. He has a vision of expanding his business to new markets and his personal goal is to educate his children.

Frank is requesting a loan to buy firewood to offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy firewood to offer for sale

loans.name: Mylene

texts.en:
Mylene, age 43, has a shop that makes and sells souvenirs like key chains, necklaces, and bracelets. She has had this business for 10 years. She and her husband have four children.

Mylene has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. She has requested a loan in the amount of PhP 11,000 to buy the materials needed for making souvenir accessories.

In the future, Mylene hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy the materials needed for making souvenir accessories

loans.name: Bernarda Lucia

texts.es: Bernarda es originaria de león  tiene 43 años de edad, soltera, tiene a su cargo 1 hijo, ella realizo estudios superiores en enfermería pero  se dedica desde hace 6 años a la venta de ropa en general como camisas y pantalones para hombres así como  para mujeres esto lo hace sin dejar de realizar su trabajo de enfermera. Ella inicio su negocio de ropa vendiéndola  a los alrededores de su casa, luego las llevaba a mostrar  a su trabajo para buscar clientela así  es como ella ha logrado irse metiendo más  en lleno a este trabajo  sacándolo adelante ella sola, también  se apoya  con el pago de su salario que recibe por el trabajo de enfermera. Bernarda solicita el préstamo con la motivación de surtir su negocio para comprar más ropa como camisas, pantalones y  bolsos deseando de la misma manera crecer como comerciante y ampliar mas su producto  dándolo a conocer en las tiendas por ser más formalizado.
texts.en:
Bernarda was born in León, is 43 years old, single, and has one child in her care. She started studying nursing, but for 6 years she has been selling clothing like men's and women's shirts and pants. She does this without giving up her work as a nurse.

She began her business by selling clothing near her home; then she traveled with it in search of customers. She has managed to make her work more fulfilling and to provide for herself. This also supplements the wages she earns as a nurse.

Bernarda is requesting this loan to stock her business and buy more clothing such as shirts, pants, and purses. She is hoping to grow as a merchant in this way, expand her products, and let the shops know that she is more established.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as shirts, pants, and purses to sell.

loans.name: Nelson Eduardo

texts.es:
Nelson tiene 22 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

Nelson es controlador en un bus. Solicita el crédito para comprar una computadora.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar la computadora para poder realizar los trabajos porque está estudiando a distancia.

La compra la va hacer en Guaranda. El sueño es poder mejorar la calidad de vida para bien. El desafío al que enfrenta es luchar contra cualquier adversidad que se presente.

En el tiempo libre le gusta dedicarse a la lectura.
texts.en:
Nelson, 22, is single and has no children.  He lives with his parents in Chimbo, province of Bolívar.  Nelson is a bus traffic controller.

He is requesting the loan to buy a computer.  With the help of the loan he will be able to buy the computer to do his school work, because he is studying by distance learning.  He will make the purchase in Guaranda.

His dream is to be able to improve his quality of life.  The challenge he faces is struggling against any adversity that presents itself.  In his free time he likes to read.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace sells fresh fruits and vegetables to earn a living. She is hard-working and lives with her husband and three children in Hioma. She has run her business for over ten years. 

Grace faces challenges in the seasonal weather variations that affects her business. She hopes to build a permanent family house in the near future. She wants to diversify her business and start a retail shop.  

She has requested a loan to buy beans, cow peas, and tomatoes to offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy beans, cow peas, and tomatoes to offer for sale.

loans.name: Lycheilyn

texts.en:
Lycheilyn, age 25, is a fish vendor. She sells fish like sardines, mackerel, and trout. She has had this business for four years. Her husband is a fisherman, and they sell the fish he catches. They have four children. 

Lycheilyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. She has requested a loan in the amount of 11,000 to buy fish to offer for sale.

In the future, Lycheilyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fish to offer for sale

loans.name: Gantumur

texts.en:
Gantumur, age 42, earns a living by making and selling traditional clothing. She lives with her husband and two children in the capital city of Mongolia. Her husband works at the shop counter. The children are enrolled in college and in high school. Both of them are about to graduate. 

She has been making traditional clothes since 2000. Her customers appreciate the products she supplies and the business has become well-known in the district. Gantumur is a hardworking and diligent woman who says, "I would like to expand the business activity by getting supplies in large quantities and selling them at the shop counter to improve the household and pay for the children's tuition fees." 

The total amount she is requesting is 1,200,000 MNT, which will be used to purchase string and fabric.

loans.use: to purchase string and fabric

loans.name: Angel Oswaldo

texts.es:
Angel Oswaldo tiene 24 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con la madre en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

Angel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, además a la cría de pollos. Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, fertilizantes, Urea, líquidos para la maleza. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo insumos que tanto falta le hace para los cultivos.

Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Chimbo.  El sueño es que en 5 años podría ampliar la productividad del maíz.
Los desafíos que se presentan son las lluvias tiende a perderse la cosecha.

En el tiempo libre le gusta se dedica a jugar indor.
texts.en:
Angel Oswaldo, 24, is single and does not have children.  He lives with his mother in Chimbo, province of Bolívar.  Angel works in agriculture, growing corn and also raising chickens.

He is requesting the loan to be able to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea, and liquid herbicide.  With the help of the loan he will be able to buy the supplies he needs so much for his crops.  He buys and sells in Chimbo.

His dream is that in five years he would be able to increase the productivity of his corn.  The challenges that present themselves are the rains that are prone to ruining the crop.

In his free time he likes to play indoor soccer.

loans.use: to be able to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea, and liquid herbicide.

loans.name: Phoebe

texts.en:
Phoebe, age 31, operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for one year. She and her husband have three children between two and seven years old. She describes herself as honest and decisive. Her business is located at a residential area and her primary customers are the local residents. 

She describes her biggest business challenge to be the high prices of clothes. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy clothes to offer for sale. 

Her business goal is to be selling clothes at the wholesale level within five years.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to offer for sale

loans.name: Linguère De Santhie Group

texts.fr: Le groupe "Linguère de SANTHIE" est composée de six femmes qui s'activent toutes dans le commerce. Les unes vendent des tissus, des articles de mercerie alors que les autres vendent du poisson, des légumes.Elles sont toutes mariées et se sont regroupées pour s'entre- aider dans leurs activités.Elles se cotisent caque mois pour constituer une épargne qu'elles utilisent souvent comme caution à leurs demandes de prêt.  La président du groupe(derrière en blanc) est mère de famille.Elle vend du poisson fumé et séché qu'elle cède à crédit à ses clients. Avec son bénéfice, elle prend en charge ses propres besoins et aide aussi son mari à entretenir les enfants. Le groupe sollicite un prêt de 990000f pour acheter des produits alimentaires, des tissus et des articles de mercerie. L'ambition des femmes est de toujours élargir leur commerce.
texts.en:
The group "Linguère de SANTHIE" is composed of six women who all work in small trade. Some sell fabrics and sewing notions while the others sell fish and vegetables. All are married, and they created this group to help each other in their activities. They make monthly contributions to a savings fund that they often use as a guarantee when applying for loans. 

The president of the group (in the back row, wearing white) is a mother. She sells smoked fish and dried fish on credit. With her profits, she supports herself and helps her husband to provide for their children. 

The group is seeking a loan of 990,000F to buy food items, fabrics, and notions. The goal of the group members is to continue to expand their businesses.

loans.use: to buy food items, fabrics and sewing notions for resale.

loans.name: Rifatullo

texts.ru: Рифатулло житель района Шахритус. Ему 25 лет. Он холост. Рифатулло занимается растениеводством. Он в основном выращивает бахчевые культуры. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и семян арбуза.
texts.en: Rifatullo is a resident of the Shahrituz region.  He is 25 years old and a bachelor.  Rifatullo is in the farming business and primarily grows melons.  He is taking out a loan to buy mineral fertilizer and watermelon seed.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer and watermelon seed

loans.name: Sylivia

texts.en:
Sylivia, age 27, sells second-hand clothing to earn her living. She lives with her husband and two children in Kasese. Her personal goal is to educate her children, build a permanent home, buy a car, and save for a wedding. She has engaged in the sale of second-hand clothing for six years now. She started her business with capital saved from her salary in the amount of 2,770,000. 

Her primary hardships are price fluctuation, inflation, seasonal weather, and inadequate capital to purchase stock. Nevertheless, she has a vision of buying land to grow crops, expanding her business to new markets, and moving her business to a permanent location.

Sylivia has requested a loan to buy clothes to offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy clothes to offer for sale

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos Alberto tiene 27 años de edad es soltero tiene un hijo, vive con los parientes y con el hijo de 4 años de edad en Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Carlos se dedica como chofer en una tricimoto. Solicita el crédito para poder comprar electrodomésticos refrigerador, microondas, cocina. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar el estilo de vida .

Las compras las hará en Ventanas.El sueño es poder comprarse un carro para afiliarse alguna cooperativa para trabajar haciendo carreras.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la competencia y día a día poder subsistir. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar la natación.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto, 27, is single and has one child.  He lives with relatives and with his four-year-old son in Ventanas, province of Los Ríos.  Carlos works driving a three-wheeled motorcycle taxi.

He is requesting the loan to be able to buy electrical appliances: a refrigerator, microwave, and stove.  With the help of the loan he will be able to improve his lifestyle.  He will make the purchases in Ventanas.

His dream is to be able to buy himself a car to become a member of a cooperative to work giving rides.  The challenges he faces are competition and daily survival.

In his free time he likes to swim.

loans.use: to be able to buy electrical appliances: a refrigerator, microwave, and stove.

loans.name: Yusufsho

texts.ru: Юсуфшо холост. Он проживает в районе Рудаки. Ему 20 лет. Образование у него среднее. Он занимается животноводством. Он в основном разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи на рынке района. Этим видом деятельности занимается два года. Кредит берет для закупа крупнорогатого скота и корма.
texts.en: Yusufsho is a bachelor.  He lives in the Rudaki region.  He is 20 years old and has a secondary-level education.  He business is animal husbandry.  He primarily raises cattle for future sale at the regional market.  He is been in this business for two years.  He is taking out a loan to buy cattle and feed.

loans.use: to buy cattle and feed

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane, age 42, is a rice dealer. She earns an income by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by sacks or by the kilo. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and members of the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 1000 in sales every day. She lives in Bacoor, Cavite, with her husband Cesarlito and their four children. They manage their household while operating the business. 

Mary Jane is working hard to continually provide income for her family's everyday expenses through her store. To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 13,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy additional stocks of rice for her business. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Mary Jane hopes to be able to acquire a commercial stall for her business and aspires to give her children a high-quality education through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional stocks of rice for her business

loans.name: Mavjigul

texts.ru: Мавчигул жительница района Рудаки. Ей 43 года. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Она занимается шитьем в швейном цеху. В этой области она работает четыре года. Кредит берет для покупки тканей. Она хочет дома сшить платья для торговли.
texts.en: Mavjigul is a resident of the Rudaki region.  She is 43 years old, married, and has three children.  She is a seamstress in a sewing factory.  She has worked in this field for four years.  She wants to sew dresses at home to sell.  She is taking out a loan to buy fabrics.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Zulaykho

texts.ru: Зулайхо 46 – летняя замужняя женщина. Она имеет четверых детей. Зулайхо занимается выпечкой кондитерских изделий для торговли. Этим видом деятельности занимается 12 лет. Кредит берет для покупки продуктов и несколько мешков муки.
texts.en: Zulaykho is 46-year-old married woman.  She has four children.  Zulaykho is in the business of baking and selling pastries.  She has been in this business for 12 years.  She is taking out a loan to buy ingredients and several sacks of flour.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and several sacks of flour

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Phoeurk

texts.en:
Phoeurk, age 53, earns an income through growing rice and raising cattle. She lives with her husband and their two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in her two endeavors for over 20 years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband is a palm juice vendor who earns approximately USD 3 per day. Two of her children are employed: one is a garment worker and another is a truck driver. Approximately, they earn USD 13 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in accessing transportation for the family, Phoeurk is requesting a loan in the amount of USD 500 in order to purchase a motorcycle to use for commuting. This purchase will enable her to use the money saved on transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a fence around her house.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to use for commuting

loans.name: Luis Bolivar

texts.es:
Luis Bolívar tiene 48 años de edad  es casado no tiene hijos, vive con la esposa  en chimbo provincia de Bolívar.

Luis es Auxiliar de Servicios. Solicita el crédito para poder comprar medicina, analgésicos.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá contar con la medicina para poder seguir en tratamiento adecuado para la salud.

Las compras de la medicina lo hara en Guaranda. El desafío al que se enfrenta son los malestares por la enfermedad.

En el tiempo libre le gusta dedicarse a la lectura.
texts.en:
Luis Bolívar, 48, is married and does not have children.  He lives with his wife in Chimbo, province of Bolívar.  Luis is a service assistant.

He is requesting the loan to be able to buy medicine, painkillers.  With the help of the loan he will be able to have the medicine to be able to continue suitable treatment for his health.

He will buy the medicine in Guaranda.  The challenge he faces is the discomfort from his illness.  In his free time he likes to read.

loans.use: to be able to buy medicine, painkillers.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: La Sra. Carmen tiene 58 años, no esta casada pero es madre soltera tiene 3 hijos que son 5,9 y 17 años, se dedica al venta de comida que se encuentran en la zona de Guapuru, calle 4 Este préstamo es la segunda secuencia que tiene dentro de la institución, la Sra. Carmen utilizara este préstamo  para la compra de material de construcción para la construcción del techo de su puesto de venta, ya que la Sra. Carmen  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las  lluvias  que le dificulta su venta ya que no puede salir a vender  y utilizara los beneficios del crédito siempre en mejoramiento de su negocio y así brindar una mejor atención de sus clientes, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que le permite siempre mejorar y seguir creciendo económicamente y también mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Carmen is 58 years old.  She is not married, but is a single mother of three children, who are 5, 9, and 17 years old.  She works selling food in the Guapuru zone, on 4th street.  This loan is the second that she has had with this organization.  Carmen will use this loan to purchase construction materials to build a roof for her food stall, since one of the challenges Carmen faces in her business is the heavy rains which make sales more difficult since she can't leave to sell.  She will make use of the benefits of the loan for the improvement of her business, and in this way offer better service to her customers.  She feels happy and grateful to the organization for the support offered since it allows her to continue improving and growing economically as well as improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a roof.

loans.name: Flor De Canela Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLOR DE CANELA” iniciará el decimo séptimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Germán Busch.  Está compuesta por ocho integrantes y cuentan con una mesa directiva a la cabeza de la misma se encuentra  la señora Ayda. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: compra de ropa americana, costura de chamarras, tienda, tejido de macramé, venta de mantas, tejidos, costura de edredones.

La señora Ayda, indica que forma parte de una asociación comunal desde hace siete años, ingresando por invitación de una amiga. En la actualidad ella cuenta con un negocio de venta de ropa, que viene trabajando hace años, conjuntamente su esposo. El crédito de este ciclo es para ampliación de su mercadería (compra de ropa) mismos que adquirirá de la Ciudad de Oruro y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en las ciudades de Cochabamba y Santa Cruz. Esta forma de trabajo le permite apoyar a su familia pues ella es casada y tiene ocho hijos.

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el préstamo.

En la fotografía no se encuentra la señora Beatriz, ya que tuvo que ir a visita médica.
texts.en:
The “Flor de Canela” (The Cinnamon Flower) communal bank will begin it tenth cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Germán Busch regional office.  It is comprised of eight members and is run by a board of directors, which is headed by Ayda.  The businesses that the members of the communal bank carry out are varied and include buying American clothes, making (sewing) jackets, a store, macramé weavings, selling blankets, knitting, and making (sewing) quilts.

Ayda says that she has been part of a communal bank for seven years.  She joined by invitation from a friend.  She currently has a business selling clothes.  She has been working in this business for years, and she works together with her husband.

Her loan for this cycle is to increase her merchandise (buy clothes).  She will get them in the city of Oruro, and after she works on them she will sell them in the cities of Cochabamba and Santa Cruz.  This way of working allows her to support her family.  She is married and has eight children.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she said that she likes the loan.

Beatriz is not in the photo because she had to go to a medical appointment.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud, age 47, runs a grocery store, which he opened in 2007. He and his wife have four children. Mahmoud sells many specially-requested goods in his store at good prices. Mahmoud is a hard-working man who is well-known in the region for his good reputation and his special customer service.

Mahmoud insists on selling his products at good prices, which is why he has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to increase his merchandise with special-offer products.
 
He believes that his business has only just begun and that he can expand his business more and more through expanding his merchandise offerings to start a wholesale trade in the future. He also intends to open a new branch.

Mahmoud is working hard to make sure that his family is are living healthfully and he is doing his best to meet their needs.

loans.use: to increase his merchandise offerings with special-offer products

loans.name: Eliphaz

texts.en:
Eliphaz, age 31, runs a retail store. He lives with his wife and three children in Kasese. His personal goals are to educate his children, build a permanent home for the family, and buy a car. 

He has been running his retail shop for four years now after starting his business with the capital of 500,000 shillings. The business is now worth 4 million shillings. His primary hardships are customers not paying on time, inadequate capital to purchase stock, and high taxes. Nevertheless, he has a vision of hiring employees to help him expand his business, buying land on which to grow crops, and moving his business to a more permanent location.

Eliphaz is requesting a loan in order to buy soap and bread to offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy soap and bread to offer for sale

loans.name: Sadbarg

texts.ru: Садбарг более семи лет занимается шитьем. По специальности она портниха. Ей 36 лет. Она разведена. Садбарг берет кредит для приобретения новой швейной машинки и закупа телят. Она уже одиннадцать лет занимается скотоводством у себя дома. На сегодняшний день она хочет увеличить количество скота и улучшить качество обслуживания.
texts.en: Sadbarg has been in the sewing business for over seven years.  She specializes in dressmaking.  She is 36 years old and divorced.  For 11 years she has been raising cattle at her home.  Now, she wants to improve the quality of her sewing services and to increase the number of her cattle.  Sadbarg is taking out a loan to buy a new sewing machine and to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and to buy calves

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce runs a retail store business where she sells music discs and tapes. She describes herself as honest. She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located in a shopping center and her primary customers are the local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate funds for improving the business. 

She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more music discs and tapes. Her business goal is to run a big retail store within five years.

loans.use: to buy more tapes and music discs for her shop

loans.name: Fenehansi

texts.en:
Fenehansi, age 54, has been a farmer for seven years. He lives with his wife and seven children in Kasese. He started on a small scale and now he uses tractors so as to farm on a larger scale. 

He is facing the challenges of inadequate capital to purchase stock and seasonal weather. Nevertheless, he is confident, and he has a goal of buying land to grow more crops.

Fenehansi is requesting a loan in order to buy maize for planting.

loans.use: to buy maize for planting

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en:
Jackson used his previous loan to buy maize and beans to offer for sale. His major hardships are price fluctuations, customers not paying on time, and inadequate capital to purchase enough stock. However, he has a vision of diversifying his business to include farming. 

He maintains the personal goals of educating his children and building a permanent house.

Jackson intends to buy maize and beans to offer for sale with this loan.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans to offer for sale

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
La Sra. LIzet, tiene 21 años de edad, tiene un hijo pequeño, es socia del grupo "Mujeres Emprendedoras", formado por 7 personas, trabajadoras y responsables.
Desde hace tres años, Lizet se dedica a la venta de golosinas en una zona muy comercial, y con los prestamos recibidos ella puede surtir sus golosinas y así poder atender mas clientes.
Gracias a su trabajo, le puede dar lo necesario a su hijo.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de gasesosas, galletas y otras golosinas.
En un futuro le gustaría tener otra carretilla de golosinas en la misma zona.
texts.en:
Lizet is 21 years old and she has a small son. She is a member of the "Mujeres Emprendedoras" group, comprised of seven hard-working and responsible people. 
For three years, Lizet has sold candy in a very commercial area. With the received loans, she can stock up on candy and attend to more customers. 
Thanks to work, she can give what is necessary to her son.
The received loan will be invested in the purchase of soft drinks, cookies and other candies. 
In the future, she would like to have another candy stand in the same area.

loans.use: invest in the purchase of soft drinks and candy to stock her stand.

loans.name: Hermilinda

texts.en:
Hermilinda, age 43, has a food shop or "carendia" where she prepares and sells viands like afritada and caldereta. She has run this business for 10 years. She and her husband have two children.

Hermilinda has been a member of HSPFI since 2010. She has requested a loan in the amount of 14,000 to buy the raw ingredients needed for making viands.

In the future, Hermilinda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy the raw ingredients needed for making viands

loans.name: Maria Micaela

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 36 años, se describe como una persona de caracter normal, que le gusta trabajar por sus hijos. María vive con sus hijos y su madre a unos 20 minutos de Ibarra en la Provincia de Imbabura.

María trabaja en la crianza de animales y agricultura, estas actividades las realiza gracias a la enseñanza de sus padres y le ayudan a sustentar los gastos de su hogar ya que es el único ingreso que tiene, es por eso que realiza su sexto crédito en Fodemi debido a que necesita incrementar su negocio de la crianza de animales, va a comprar crías de cerdo para engorde y reproducción y obtener mejores ingresos.

María sueña con ser distribuidora mayoritaria de cerdos.
texts.en:
María is a 36 year-old woman who describes herself as a person of character who enjoys working for her children.  María lives with her children and her mother about 20 minutes from Ibarra in the Imbabura Province.

María works in agriculture and raising animals.  She is able to do these tasks thanks to the teaching of her parents and this helps her to keep up with the household expenses since this is the only income she has.  It is for this reason that she is requesting her sixth loan from Fodemi.  Due to the need to increase her animal raising business, she is going to purchase piglets to fatten and breed, so that she obtains a better income.

María dreams of being a major distributor of pigs.

loans.use: to purchase piglets to fatten and breed.

loans.name: Vicente Juan Felipe

texts.es:
Vicente es un joven de veintitrés años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad caracteriza por tener un clima cálido en cualquier época del año, asimismo se caracteriza por su agricultura en especial el cultivo del Algodón, esparrago, uva, alcachofa y paprika. Como buen peruano a Vicente le gusta mucho la comida por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “Arroz con pollo”. Estudio hasta el quinto año de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Mecánica automotriz.

Con mucho esfuerzo él se dedica a su negocio como chofer de mototaxi, el le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes el día; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque se esfuerza mucho y porque atiende a los clientes de manera amable.

Vicente está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mantenimiento a su vehículo podrá comprar una radio y parlantes para su vehículo; lo que le permitirá dar mayor comodidad a los clientes y seguir trabajando para poder cumplir su gran sueño:” Tener un automóvil propio”.
texts.en:
Vicente is a twenty three year old young man. He lives in the city of Ica, characterized by having a warm climate all year round. It is also characterized by its agriculture and especially by its cotton, asparagus, grape, artichoke and paprika crops. As a good Peruvian, Vicente really likes food and one of his favorite dishes is the delicious chicken and rice.  He went to school up to the fifth year of secondary school, but he would have liked to study auto mechanics.  

With a lot of hard work he is dedicated to his business as a motorcycle taxi driver. He works at it around 10 hours a day and serves around 20 customers a day. He believes that it is going well for him in his business because he works hard and serves his customers in a friendly way

Vicente is very grateful to the Kiva lenders and thanks to the help they have given him he will be able to do maintenance on his vehicle and buy a radio and speakers. This will allow him to provide more comfort for his customers and keep working to achieve his biggest dream: "have his own car".

loans.use: to do maintenance on a vehicle and buy a radio and speakers.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de productos secos y crianza de animales,la socia vende trigo,cebada y maiz,y la socia tambien vende cuyes y gallinas,por medio de estos negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar los negocios de crianza de animales y negocio de venta de productos secos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar trigo,maiz y cebada y tambien para comprar alimentos para los animales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maria continues working at her business, selling dry goods and raising animals.  She sells wheat, barley, and corn, and she also sells guinea pigs and chickens.  Through these businesses, Maria helps her children to be successful.  Her dream is to expand her dry good sales and animal raising businesses.  She is requesting this loan to purchase wheat, corn, and barley and also to buy feed for the animals.

Maria is happy for the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to purchase wheat, corn, and barley, and also to buy feed for the animals.

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente est  entrepreneur, âgée de 35 ans, mariée. Elle est  vendeuses des couvertures et draps de lit. Elle a commencé son business de lors qu’elle  a été mariée. Les  Son mari est un pasteur évangéliste. Bénéfices de son activité servent d’épargne, d’alimentation et la scolarisation de ses enfants. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir  son  9eme  crédit de Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  7 couvertures et draps.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir et construire confortablement pour ses enfants.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  les actions d’autonomisation de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en:
This client is a 35-years-old entrepreneur who is married. She sells blankets and bed sheets. She started her business when she was married. Her husband is an evangelical pastor. The profits from her work go to savings, food, and educating her children. 

However, she just obtained her ninth loan from Hekima. This new loan must serve to supply her with seven blankets and sheets. In additions, she wishes to see her children grow up and to build with ease [a house] for her children. 

This client thanks Hekima for its actions for poor women excluded from traditional banks to become autonomous.

loans.use: to pay for 7 blankets and sheets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to make the wall and roofing of her house.

loans.name: Esneida Francisca

texts.es: Esneida tiene 26 años de edad , con un hijo a cargo, comerciante, originaria de  Chinandega. Se dedica a la venta  de frutas, verduras, frescos, agua, gaseosas y pan  lleva  7 años con este negocio, su pequeño tramo es muy humilde púes no cuenta con estantes, vitrinas ni mucho menos un techo se protege del sol por medio de una carpa de tela o de plástico pero eso no le impide ganarse la vida honradamente. Donde cada mañana lograr armar su tramo y colocar sus productos en canastas hechas de mimbre con la esperanza de cada día le irá mejor.  Ella  puso su negocio  con  capital propio y ayuda económica de su marido. Solicito el crédito  para comprar mercadería tales como frutas, verduras, gaseosas y pan. Su meta es seguir en el negocio y darle lo mejor dentro de sus posibilidades a su hijo.
texts.en: Esneida is 26 years old and has one son.  She works in commerce and is from Chinandega.  She works selling fruit, vegetables, soft drinks, water, soda, and bread.  She has worked for 7 years at this business.  Her small food stall is humble; it doesn't have shelves or a display window, much less a roof.  She protects herself from the sun with a fabric or plastic tarp.  However, this doesn't stop her from earning her living honorably.  Each morning, she manages to set up her stall and place her products in wicker baskets with the hope that each day will go better for her.  She started her business with her own capital and financial help from her husband.  Esneida is requesting this loan to purchase merchandise such as fruit, vegetables, soft drinks, and bread.  Her goal is to continue with the business and provide the best opportunities for her son that she is able.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as fruit, vegetables, sodas, and bread.

loans.name: Anacleta

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedica al negocio de venta de productos secos,la socia vende trigo,maiz,cebada y moraya,la socia vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los productos secos.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar  productos secos al por mayor como maiz, trigo y cebada. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member works at the business of selling dry goods.  She sells wheat, corn, barley and freeze dried potatoes.  She sells from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. and through this small business she helps her children get ahead.  Her dream is to have a store where she can sell her dry goods.  She is asking for a loan to buy wholesale dry goods such as corn, wheat and barley.

The member is happy because of the loan and she is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to buy wholesale dry goods such as corn, wheat and barley.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de productos secos como trigo,cebada y maiz,ella vende en el mercado,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de cereales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar  productos secos como trigo, maíz,moraya y quinua al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues to sell dried goods like wheat, barley, and corn.  She sells at the market, and this is her way of bringing up her children.  Her dream is to increase the business by selling cereal.  She requests the loan to buy dried goods like wheat, corn, dried potatoes and quinoa in bulk.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make all her payments.

loans.use: buy dried goods like what, corn, dried potatoes, and quinoa in bulk.

loans.name: Pedro Joaquin

texts.es: Pedro Joaquín tiene 59 años de edad, la actividad a la que se dedica es la venta de leña, leche, granos básicos  el negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación donde atiende a sus clientes. El emprendedor  tiene a su cargo un hijo  es el que lo ayuda en el negocio, ya tiene clientes fijos a quienes les ofrece su producto. Pedro desde muy joven ha trabajado para apoyar a la familia en los gastos del hogar y ha salido adelante con mucho esfuerzo para lograr sus objetivos. Pedro Joaquín está solicitando financiamiento para la compra productos para el negocio como leña, y granos básicos para ofrecerle a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Pedro Joaquín, 59, works selling firewood, milk, and basic necessities.  This business is located in his home, where he attends to his customers.  The entrepreneur supports one son, who is the one who helps him in the business.  He already has regular customers to whom he sells his products.

Pedro has worked from a very young age to support his family in the household expenses, and he has gotten ahead with great effort to achieve his goals.

Pedro Joaquín is requesting financing to buy products for his business such as firewood and basic necessities to sell to his customers.

loans.use: to buy firewood and basic necessities to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Lidia Elizabeth

texts.es: Lidia de 34 años vive (suburbio guayaquil ) ella empezó este negocio con su esposo haciendo panes. Después de la separación que tuvo con su esposo ella decidió seguir con la panadería mucho esfuerzo y dedicación trabaja todos los días tiene dos ayudantes . en el futuro ella desea mejorara su negocio y su vida económica ´para su familia. Con el préstamo comprara ( harina, huevos, leche)
texts.en:
Lidia is 34 years old and lives in a suburb of Guayaquil.  She began this business making bread with her husband.  After her separation from her husband she decided to continue with the bakery and she works with a lot of effort and dedication every day.  She has two assistants.  

In the future she would like to improve her business and her economic life for her family.  With the loan she will buy wheat, eggs and milk.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs and milk.

loans.name: Fijalah

texts.en: Fijalah is a 35-year-old married man with five children living in Kasese, Uganda. His personal goal is to educate his children and construct a residential house. For the last three years, he has been operating a retail shop as a source of income. His major challenges are price fluctuation and high taxes. He has a vision of diversifying his business to include farming. Fijalah needs this loan to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.name: Pablo Alberto

texts.es: pablo de 53 años vive ( suburbio Guayaquil ) empezó vendiendo helados para otra persona . luego el decidio ponerse su propio negocio de helado Y le funciono . el le da trabajo ahora a tres personas para la venta de helados. Trabaja con esfuerzo y dedicación todod los días. A futuro el desea tener una camioneta para trasladar su mercadería. Con el préstamo comprara cemento y pinturas para mejorar su casa y helados para tener mas ingresos en sus ventas.
texts.en:
Pablo is 53 and lives in a suburb of Guayaquil.  He started selling ice cream for another person.  Later he decided to start his own ice cream business and it worked out for him.  He now gives work to three other people selling ice cream.  He works hard with great dedication every day.  In the future he would like to have a pick-up to move his merchandise.  

With the loan he will buy cement and paint to improve his house and ice cream to have more income from his sales.

loans.use: to buy cement, paint and ice cream.

loans.name: Denes

texts.en:
Denes is a twenty-six-year-old married man with children. He lives in a permanent house in the district of Kyenjojo, Uganda. He wishes to have all the required gadgets for his salon and run a successful salon. He also has a personal goal of educating his children so that they can have a better future. 

Denes wants a loan to buy shaving machines for his salon.

loans.use: to buy shaving machines for his salon

loans.name: Sonia Maricel

texts.es: Sonia de 33 años vive( suburbio Guayaquil). Ella decidió este trabajo ya que su espozo se lo enseño por que  el lo aprendió de  un amigo . el decidio independizarce con su esposa . ella  trabaja todos los días junto a su espozo. A futuro ella desea mantener su familia y tener su negocio en progreso- con el préstamo comprara (materia prima) como fomix, cartulina, telas, tijeras etc.
texts.en: Sonia, 33, lives in Suburbio, Guayaquil.  She decided on this work because her husband taught it to her; he had learned from a friend.  He decided to become independent with his wife.  She works every day alongside her husband.  In future, she’d like to support her family and have a business that’s making progress.  She will use the loan to buy raw materials like Fomix [vinyl ethylene acetate], construction paper, fabric, scissors, etc.

loans.use: to buy crafts making supplies.

loans.name: Silvia Patricia

texts.es: Silvia de 50 años vive (suburbio Guayaquil) ella empezó A cocer desde pequeña  para poder aprender y ponerce su negocio de cocer . se vio obligada a ponerlo en practica desde que se caso. De esa manera sustentar a su familia. Trabaja todos los días con ganas y esfuezo sola . a futuro ella anhela que su negocio cresca y tener su vivienda en buen estado.con el préstamo comprara ( tela hilos etc).
texts.en: Silvia, 50, lives in Suburbio, Guayaquil.  She started sewing there while still a little girl to learn and to set up a sewing business and she found herself needing to put it into practice when she got married in order to support her family.  She works alone every day with effort and determination.  In the future she hopes her business will grow and that she'll have her house in good conditions.  She will use the loan to buy fabric, thread, etc.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Nyansio

texts.en:
Nyansio, age 56, would like to request a loan in order to buy groundnuts and maize to offer for sale. He dreams of owning a store in a big town as he feels that this will enable him to be financially stable.

Seasonal weather is affecting his business, as this puts produce at high prices.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts and maize to offer for sale

loans.name: Lysbel Lida

texts.es: Lysbel es socia del Banco Comunal Señor de Sumaqcha, tiene 26 años, tiene una tienda de abarrotes, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 5 años, en Finca ella aprendió el valor del ahorro y de ser mas responsable, esta muy satisfecha de todo lo que puede alcanzar si ella sigue con el animo de poder en el futuro tener una negocio propio ya que esta tienda lo comparte con su mamá. Ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes para la tienda.
texts.en: Lysbel is a member of the Communal Bank "Señor de Sumaqcha."  She is 26 years old and has a grocery store.  She has been a member of Finca Perú for 5 years and through Finca has learned the value of saving and being more responsible.  She is very satisfied with all that she can accomplish if she continues with the enthusiasm of being able to have her own business in the future, since she shares this store with her mother.  Now, she will invest the loan in the purchase of groceries for the store.

loans.use: to purchase groceries.

loans.name: Maria Jocelyn

texts.en:
Maria Jocelyn is 45 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married.

Maria Jocelyn has a food retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages.  She is also making and selling flavored ice candy.  She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 15,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Maria Jocelyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2010.  In the future, Maria Jocelyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell

loans.name: Sheryl

texts.en: Sheryl is 31 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has two children. Sheryl has a food shop that sells snacks like rice and pan cakes, and halo-halo or flavored crush ice. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 11,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients for making snacks. Sheryl has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Sheryl hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks

loans.name: Coumba Faty

texts.fr:
Madame Coumba Faty est une marchande de légumes depuis plus de 20 ans déjà. Elle n’est pas aussi jeune que cela mais se débrouille avec son activité afin de pouvoir améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille. Elle est à son deuxième prêt et ne demande que 100000F CFA afin d’acheter de la marchandise c'est-à-dire des légumes et de garder un petit fond pour ne pas être en rupture si la vente est rapide.
Elle est mariée et a 3 enfants qui ont entre 25 ans et 15 ans. Elle a ses propre s charges mais cela ne l’empêche pas de jeter un regard sur ses enfants. Comme projet futur elle a envie de vendre de l’or, mais aussi de faire de l’embouche.
texts.en:
Ms. Coumba Faty has been a vegetables merchant for over twenty years already. She is not as young as that, but gets by well enough with her business, so as to improve her family's food situation. She is on her second loan and is only asking for 100,000 francs CFA to buy some merchandise, that is, vegetables, and to maintain a small fund for avoiding inventory shortages if sales are quick. 

She is married and has three children, who are from 15 to 25 years old. She has her own expenses, but this does not prevent her from seeing to her children. As for future plans, she is thinking about selling gold but also raising livestock.

loans.use: to buy and sell vegetables

loans.name: Sandra Karina

texts.es: Sandra de 32 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene una pequeña papelería. Trabaja vendiendo papelería. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su papelería ya que tiene dos hijos y quiere darle una buena vida económica. Por eso quiere el préstamo para incrementa su mercadería con cuadernos, plumas, artículos etc.
texts.en: Sandra, 32, is a hardworking woman who has a small stationery shop.  She works selling paper goods.  She has many hopes for her shop since she has two children that she wants to provide a good economic life for which is why she wants the loan to increase her stock merchandise with notebooks, pens, items, etc.

loans.use: to buy stationery supplies, notebooks, pens, etc.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita es socia del Banco Comunal Señor de Sumaqcha, tiene ahora una tienda de abarrotes, antes daba pensión a pocos comensales, pero vio que por su cuadra no había tienda con el apoyo de su esposo pudieron abrir una pequeña tienda, claro que recién están empezando, pero ella  desea que todo le vaya bien con todo lo que puede aprender en Finca ella esta logrando sus metas, hace ya 6 años que es socia y agradece todo el apoyo que le dieron, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes para poder llenar  su pequeña tienda.
texts.en: Margarita is a member of the “Señor de Sumaqcha” communal bank and she has a grocery store now; she used to provide meals for a few diners but noting that there was no store on her block with help from her husband they were able to open a small store.  Of course, they are just starting but she hopes that everything will go well and with everything she’s learning from Finca she’s reaching her goals.  She’s been a member for 6 years already and she is grateful for all the support they’ve given her.   With the loan now she will buy groceries to fill her small store.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Ricky

texts.en:
Ricky is 31 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is separated with 3 children.

Ricky has a vulcanizing shop that provides repair and fixing of vehicles. He has had this business for 8 years. He requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy tools and pay for the electricity for the services.

Ricky has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Ricky hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the electricity for the services

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a thirty-nine-year-old married lady with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. Her personal goal is to educate her children and buy a car. She has been a poultry farmer for five years now, after starting with a few birds. She now has over three hundred birds. The major hardships are price fluctuations, seasonal weather and inadequate capital to purchase stock. However, she has a goal of hiring employees to help expand her business, and venturing into a motorcycle transport business.

Grace needs a loan to buy a second hand motorcycle for a transport business.

loans.use: to buy a second hand motorcycle for transport business

loans.name: Jason

texts.en:
Jason is 23 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married.

Jason is providing a motorela or motorcycle service. He has had this business for 2 years. He requested a loan for 11,000 PHP to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the service.

Jason has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Jason hopes to improve his service.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the service

loans.name: Yolanda Mireya

texts.es:
Yolanda es una mujer muy trabajadora, responsable en sus actividades diarias, tiene 51 años, vive con sus padres en Pimampiro que se encuentra ubicado a una hora de la ciudad de Ibarra en la Provincia de Imbabura.

Yolanda trabaja con su padre en la compra venta de prodúctos químicos y agrícolas, negocio que les permite sustentar las necesidades de su hogar, debido a que es el único ingreso económico que tienen, es por eso que realiza su sexto crédito en Fodemi, el mismo que va a ser utilizado en la compra de abonos, fungicidas, medicinas para los sembríos, antiplagas que es lo que le hace falta en su local y sus clientes le estan solicitando, con este proceso comercial Yolanda incrementará sus clientes, sus ventas y por ende sus ingresos.

Yolanda sueña con tener un local grande para sus productos y construirse una casa.
texts.en:
Yolanda is a very hardworking woman who is very responsible with her daily activities.  She’s 51 years old and lives with her parents in Pimampiro which is located an hour away from the city of Ibarra in Imbabura Province.

Yolanda works with her father selling chemicals and farm supplies, a business that allows them to meet household expenses since this is their only source of income.  Because of this, they are taking out their 6th loan with Fodemi to buy manure, fungicide, crop medicine, bug killer which is what they need in their store and that their customers are requesting.  With this process, Yolanda will increase her clientele and her sales and thus her income.  Yolanda dreams with having a large locale for her products and with building a house for herself.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Paola Yamileth

texts.es: Paola es socia del Banco Comunal Señor de Sumaq Soncco, tiene 20, no tiene hijos, es soltera, es dueña de una Ferretería, este corto tiempo de un ciclo que esta en Finca Perú pudo aprender mucho para poder llevar bien su negocio, y tratar de hacer bien las inversiones para que su negocio pueda crecer, ha aprendido mucho en Finca, como el ahorro, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de fierros.
texts.en: Paola is a member of the Communal Bank "Señor de Sumaq Soncco."  She is 20 years old, single, and has no children.  She is the owner of a hardware store.  In the short time that she has been involved with Finca Perú, she has learned a lot about how to run a business and has tried to make good investments so that her business can grow.  She has learned a lot with Finca, like how to save.  Now, with the loan, she will invest in the purchase of iron products.

loans.use: to purchase products made of iron.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de compra y venta de semillas,la socia lo vende en el mercado,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las semillas.La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar semillas al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues with her business buying and selling seeds in the market.  She works from 8am until 6pm and through this small business is able to support her children.  Her dream is to have a locale in which to sell seeds.  She is asking for the loan to buy seeds at wholesale.  She is happy with the loan and committed to making her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds at wholesale.

loans.name: Lidia Juvita

texts.es: Lidia es socia del Banco Comunal Señor de Sumaqcha, tiene 57 años, es madre de 4 hijos,  esta en Finca Perú desde hace 10 años, cuando se inició en Finca ella tenia muy poco capital, ahora con todo el trabajo que pudo realizar en su tienda de abarrotes pudo salir adelante, cumplió su sueño de terminar de construir su casa, y lo que también le llena de satisfacción es haberles ayudado en los estudios de sus hijos, ella ahorra, las cosa han cambiado mucho desde que esta en Finca y recibe los préstamos, siente que ella va a progresar mucho mas y tratara de subir los escalones del éxito. Ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes.
texts.en: Lidia is a member of the “Señor de Sumaqcha” communal bank.  She’s 57 years old and the mother of four children.  She’s been in Finca Perú for the last 10 years.  When she started with Finca she had very little capital.  Now with all her work she’s managed to succeed wither grocery store and get ahead.  She reached her dream of finishing building her house and another thing that fills her with satisfaction is having been able to help her children with their schooling.  She saves up and things have changed quite a bit since she’s been in Finca receiving loans.  She feels that she’s been making much progress and she will attempt to ascend the steps toward success.  The loan now will be sued to buy groceries.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is requesting a loan in order to buy more cattle to offer for sale. He is a married man dealing in the cattle trade in Kyenjojo, Uganda. 

He dreams of building a permanent house and ensuring the education of his children. His primary challenges include the high cost of cows and stringent restrictions on cattle movement.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to offer for sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more clothes for selling.

loans.name: Norma Violeta

texts.es: Norma es socia del Banco Comunal Señor de Sumaq Soncco, tiene 45 años, es madre de 3 hijos, se dedica a la  venta de dulces y la elaboración de los mismos, ella en Finca pudo aprender mucho en su estadía así como ahorrar, la responsabilidad, la puntualidad y valorarse como mujer, ahora el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de Harina, azúcar, huevo  y manteca.
texts.en: Norma is a member of  the Communal Bank "Señor de Sumaq Soncco."  She is 45 years old and the mother of 3 children años.  She works making and selling sweets.  With Finca, she has learned a lot in her position such as responsibility, punctuality, how to save and how to value herself as a woman.  Now, she will invest this loan in the purchase of flour, sugar, eggs, and lard.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, eggs, and lard.

loans.name: Estalin Damian

texts.es:
ESTALIN DAMIAN tiene 21 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos vive con los padres en Guaranda provincia de bolívar.

 ESTALIN DAMIAN trabaja de mesero en las noches en un restaurante de parrilladas. Solicita el crédito para comprar libros y pagar las pasantías. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá estar tranquilo porque va ha tener el dinero para poder realizar las pasantías.
 Las compras de los libros lo hará en Riobamba. El sueño es poder ser un buen mecánico automotriz, y tener un negocio propio.

Enfrentamos desafíos en este caso la competencia pero sin embargo va a poner todo el empeño para ser un buen profesional y lo reconozcan.

En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar y cuidar a los padres.
texts.en:
Estalin Damian, 21, is single and has no children; he lives with his parents in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.  He works nights as a waiter in a grilled meat restaurant and has requested the loan to buy textbooks and pay for his apprenticeship.

With help from the loan he will be able to be at peace because he’ll have money to complete his apprenticeship.  He will buy the books in Riobamba.  His dream is to become a good auto mechanic and to have his own business.

The challenge faced in this case is competition however he will put all his effort into becoming a good, well-recognized professional.  In his free time he enjoys playing and caring for his parents.

loans.use: to buy textbooks and pay for his apprenticeship.

loans.name: Maria Felix

texts.es: María, de 33 años, soltera, con 5 hijos de los cuales 4 de ellos están a su  cargo y 1 es independiente, de oficio comerciante originaria de Chichigalpa municipio de Chinandega. Su negocio es venta de frutas y verduras. Aunque no es un local  que no cuenta con muchos lujos, pero es el negocio con el cual mantiene a sus hijos  ,no tiene otros ingresos. Los canastos de mimbre y plásticos son sus exhibidores de frutas y verduras pero aun así en medio de su pobreza busca como salir adelante tratando de darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia. Tiene 5 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, antes de dedicaba al comercio ambulante; solicito el crédito para invertir en el negocio con la compra de cebollas, chayotes, papas, pepinos y otras clases de verdura que son necesarias para surtir su tramo. su meta a corto plazo es seguir en el negocio y meter a estudiar a sus hijos, a mediano plazo es comprar un camioncito para el transporte de la mercadería y largo plazo comprar su propia casa ya que a donde vive es de su mama.
texts.en:
María, 33, is single and has five children four of which are still in her care and one is independent.  She is a merchant from Chichigalpa, Chinandega Municipality.  Her business is selling fruit and vegetables.  Although her locale has no luxuries it’s the business that supports her children; she has no other source of income.  Wicker and plastic baskets are her display cases for fruit and vegetables but even in the midst of her poverty she seeks ways to get ahead and try to give her family a better standard of living.  

She’s been in this business for five years; she used to be an ambulatory street vendor.  She requested the loan to invest in her business buying onions, chayote, potatoes, cucumbers and other kinds of vegetables that are necessary to stock her stand.  

Her short-term goal is to stay in business and enroll her children in school.  Her medium-term goal is to buy a small truck to transport her merchandise and her long-term goal is to buy a house of her own since she currently lives in her mother’s house.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables to stock her business.

loans.name: Alex German

texts.es:
Alex Germán tiene 20 años de edad es casado tiene un hijo, vive con la esposo y con el hijo de 1 mes de edad en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

Alex es asistente jurídico, además es digitador en un cyber. Solicita el crédito para poder comprar un computador.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar la computadora para poder  realizar  trabajos que antes realizaba en el cyber.

La compra lo realizará  en Quito y los trabajos los hará en Guaranda. El sueño es poder tener el título en marketing. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son en el sector social conocer y relacionarse con otras personas. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el fútbol.
texts.en:
Alex Germán is 20 years old, married, and has one son.  He lives with his wife and son, who is one month old, in the Guaranda province of Bolívar.

Alex works as a legal assistant as well as doing data entry in an Internet cafe.  He is requesting this loan to be able to purchase a computer.

With the help of the loan, he will be able to purchase the computer and do the work that he previously had to do in the Internet cafe.

He will make the purchase in Quito and he will do the work in Guaranda.  His dream is to be able to obtain a degree in marketing.  The challenges that he faces are in the social realm--networking with other people.  In his free time, he likes to play soccer.

loans.use: to purchase a computer.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en: Mariam is a Kiva borrower. She has four children with ages ranging from 5 months to 7 years. She describes herself as kind. She operates a grocery stall where she sells vegetables and fruits such as cabbages, kales, carrots, mangoes, etc. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a busy place and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the small room where she does her daily business operation. She will use this 20,000 Kenyan shilling loan to buy more vegetables and pay for a room for business operation. Her business goal is to run a big wholesale grocery store within five years.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables and pay for the construction of a room for business operation.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos tiene 31 años de edad  es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los tíos en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

Juan trabaja en la venta de libros. Solicita el crédito para comprar electrodomésticos cómo refrigerador, microondas, plancha.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo que necesita para la casa. Las compras lo realizará en guaranda. 
El sueño es poder mantenerse en el trabajo par que no le falte el dinero.

El desafío al que se enfrenta es crecer como profesional y no tener problemas.

En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbol  es arquero,  pertenece a un equipo y es arquero en las ligas barriales.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos, 31, is single and has no children; he lives with his uncles in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.  Juan works selling books and is asking for the loan to buy home appliances like a refrigerator, a microwave oven and an iron.

With help from the loan he will be able to buy what he needs for the house.  He will make his purchases in Guaranda.  His dream is to stay in business so that he will not lack money.  The challenge he faces is to grow as a professional and not have any problems.  In his free time he enjoys playing soccer; he’s a goalie and belongs to a neighborhood league.

loans.use: to buy appliances like a refrigerator, a microwave oven and an iron.

loans.name: Vicente Jacinto

texts.es: Vicente de 53 años vive (machala ecuador) el decidió ponerse una tienda desde que se izo de compromiso . su esposa le ayuda abministrar el negocio cuando el hace trabajo de albañil. Trabaja todos los días con esfuerzo y dedicación. A futuro el desea tener su negocio grande  y tener en buen estado a su familia. Con el préstamo comprara ( arroz aceite etc).
texts.en: Vicente is 53 and lives in Machala, Ecuador.  He decided to start a store since he made a commitment to himself.  His wife helps him manage the business when he works as a bricklayer.  He works every day with effort and dedication.  In the future, he hopes to have a larger business and take good care of his family.  With this loan, he will buy rice, oil, etc.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, rice, and oils.

loans.name: Augustine

texts.en:
Augustine is a 57-year-old married man with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been a fisherman for 20 years after starting with capital of 600,000. His major hardships are price fluctuations and the stringent regulations on fishing by the state. However, Augustine has a vision of diversifying his business to include a retail shop and buying land to grow crops. 

Augustine needs a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Eljen

texts.en:
Eljen is 45 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 4 children. 

Eljen makes and sells home-made ice cream using a motorcycle with a side box for the ice cream container. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy the raw ingredients needed for making home-made ice cream.

Eljen has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy the raw ingredients needed for making home-made ice cream.

loans.name: Channy

texts.en:
Channy, 44, is married and resides with his wife and three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. He is a construction foreman who earns about USD 5 per day. His wife and two children are employed in the garment factory. They earn about USD 3 per day. 

Due to a lack of funds, Channy is requesting a loan of USD 600 to purchase construction materials to use in his construction work. This purchase would enable him to get enough materials to use and generate more income to support the family. In the future, he would like to expand his business and help his children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to use in his construction work.

loans.name: Maria Helena

texts.es:
María de 50 años, madre soltera con dos hijos independientes, comerciante, originaria de Chinandega. Su negocio es un tramo de ropa en general en el mercado de la ciudad  con 6 años de estar  funcionando, lo puso con capital propio y apoyo económico del padre de sus hijos. Sus comienzos fueron muy difíciles pues no tenía un local propio se dedicaba a vender de manera ambulante, pero con tiempo y arduo trabajo logro tener un  punto fijo en el mercado para vender ropa.
Solicito el crédito para comprar ropa para dama, caballero, camisetas, pantalones, faldas ,short y mercadería en general. tiene buena referencia crediticia en otras instituciones  financieras, su metas invertir más al negocio y hacer mejoras de vivienda.
texts.en:
María is 50 years old and a single mother of two independent children.  She works in commerce and is from Chinandega.  Her business is a small general clothing store in the city market.  With 6 years of being in business, she started with her own capital and financial support from the father of her children.  In the beginning, it was very difficult; she didn't have her own location, so she sold door to door.  However, with time and hard work, she was able to have a fixed place in the market to sell clothing.

María is requesting the loan to purchase women and men's clothing, T-shirts, pants, skirts, shorts, and general merchandise.  She has good credit references from other financial institutions.  Her goals are to invest more in the business and to make improvements to her home.

loans.use: para comprar ropa para dama, caballero, camisetas, pantalones, faldas ,short y mercadería en general.

loans.name: Kleber Jacinto

texts.es: Klever de 34 años vive (machala ecuador) el decidió ponerse una tienda desde que se izo de compromiso . su esposa le ayuda abministrar el negocio cuando el hace trabajo de albañil. Trabaja todos los días con esfuerzo y dedicación. A futuro el desea tener su propia casa y tener en buen estado a su familia. Con el préstamo comprara ( arroz, aceite, bebidas etc).
texts.en: Klever is 34 and lives in Machala, Ecuador.  He decided to start a store since he made a commitment to himself.  His wife helps him manage the business when he works as a bricklayer.  He works every day with effort and dedication.  In the future, he hopes to have his own home and take good care of his family.  With this loan, he will buy rice, oil, drinks, etc.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, and drinks.

loans.name: Luis Severo

texts.es: Luis de 47 años vive ( machala ecuador) el desde muy pequeño se dedicaba a la venta de mariscos.el logro ponerse una tienda en la  que vende pescado. Con muchas ganas y esfuerzo se dedica a trabajar todos los días solo. A futuro el desea tener una casa bonita y distribuir  pescado por mayor. Con el préstamo comprara ( pescados ).
texts.en: Luis is 47 and lives in Machala, Ecuador.  Since he was very young, he has made a living selling seafood.  He was able to start a store selling fish.  With a lot of determination and effort, he works alone every day.  In the future, he hopes to have a nice house and be a wholesale fish distributor.  With this loan, he will buy fish.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy timber for the workshop.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 54 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 7 children. 

Rebecca has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. 

Rebecca has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages. In the future, Rebecca hopes to improve her business. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2009.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy another printer.

loans.name: Eddy

texts.en: Eddy is a 39-year-old married lady with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been selling crude oil for 18 years after using her savings from farming as start-up capital. Her challenges are high fuel and transportation costs and inadequate capital to purchase stock. However, she has a vision of expanding her business to new areas. Eddy needs money to buy crude palm oil for resale.

loans.use: to buy crude palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Raymundo

texts.es:
Raymundo vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos a los cuales ama muchísimo en la ciudad de Camana; ciudad que se caracteriza por tener playas hermosas, clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo es la cuna de los riquísimos camarones y por su agricultura, en especial el cultivo de arroz, considerado uno de los mejores del  mundo. Como buen peruano le gusta mucho la comida por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es el riquísimo “Tallarín Verde” y  en su tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos. 
Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación el trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, el le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 12 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 70 clientes en el día; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque atiende de manera ambla a los clientes y sobre todo porque es muy honrado.
Raymundo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoramientos en su vivienda en especial reforzar las paredes y el techo, lo que le permitirá darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y seguir trabajando para poder cumplir su más grande sueño:”Darle una buena educación a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Raymundo lives with his wife and two children, whom he loves very much, in the city of Camana.  This city is characterized by having beautiful beaches and a warm climate.  It is known for its delicious shrimp and its agriculture, especially for its rice, which is considered among the best in the world.  Like a good Peruvian, he likes food a lot, and one of his favorite dishes is the delicious "tallarín verde."  In his free time, he likes to play soccer with his friends.

With a lot of effort and dedication, he works driving a motorcycle taxi.  He works around 12 hours a day, and he can serve up to 70 customers in a day.  He believes his business is going well because he treats his customers well, and above all, he is very honest.

Raymundo is very thankful for the Kiva lenders, and he is thankful for the help they have offered him.  He will be able to make improvements to his home, specifically to reinforce the walls the walls and the roof, which will let him give a better quality of life to his family and to keep working to fulfill his biggest dream: "to give his children a good education."

loans.use: to improve his home.

loans.name: Lideres En Accion Group

texts.es:
Enit Melly, tiene 36 años de edad, tiene tres hijos. Ella forma parte del grupo "Lideres en acción" que está formado por 7 socios, quienes la eligieron como la tesorera del grupo.
Desde hace siete años, inició su negocio instalando una bodega en su domicilio, gracias a su trabajo y a su empeño, ella ha logrado aportar y apoyar económicamente en los gastos familiares.
Su negocio ha ido creciendo poco a poco, inició con un poco de golosinas, luego fué aumentando las bebidas y actualmente está surtiendo su bodega con abarrotes.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de abarrotes para surtir su bodega.
texts.en:
